oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Larry Bone, Mayor Orgill, and Wassell Randolph
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Memphis Public Library & Information Center; Main Library; Orgill, Edmund; Bone, Larry; Randolph, Wassell; 1960s;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: From L to R: Larry Bone; Mayor Edmund Orgill; and Wassell Randolph standing over two children in the Main Library. The boy holds the book "Lassie Come Home." Note on back: "Wassell Randolph -- Mayor Edmund Orgill -- Larry Bone -- at Main -- 5/63."
